section.paragraph: Aleksander and the eZ Awards crowd.
The entertainment during the eZ Awards.
Bertrand and Mariko handing out the partner of the year award.
The 800 people attending the eZ Awards.

You´re invited to the biggest Open Source Content Management conference in Europe! Once again, the annual conference will take place in Skien, Norway in June 2008. Meet with key, international experts in the CMS and Open Source industry and learn more about the business solutions that eZ is bringing to you.

paragraph.line: The annual eZ Awards are a highlight of the conference, bringing in close to 800 attendees in 2007. The awards will recognize the contribution of the members of the eZ Ecosystem that have consistently been engaged in the business and promoting eZ´s core values. Local and political support makes this awards night a special event in the Grenland area!
More information on how to register and sponsor is available here .

ezremote:object.name: Site of the Year eZ Award goes to Lagardere

ezobject:object-translation.object_name: Site of the Year eZ Award goes to Lagardere

ezobject:attribute.name: Title
ezobject:attribute.text: Site of the Year eZ Award goes to Lagardere

section.paragraph: Lagardere is the the world´s biggest publisher well known for titles such as Elle, Car&Driver and Paris Match. This France based publisher was the winner for the Site of the Year eZ Award at the 2007 event, for their contribution to the Premiere site.

paragraph.line: eZ Systems was proud to announce Lagardere as the winner based on the following criteria:

li.paragraph: Submitted on ez.no and chosen among the last 12 site of the month winners
Design, look and feel (value a modern and usable interface)
Creative use of extensions and integrations

paragraph.line: Lagardere is known world-wide and they choose to work with eZ Publish for all of their digital content needs.

section.paragraph: "It is impressive to see such an international and well-known company count on eZ for their core business functions" says Bård Farstad, CTO of eZ Systems.

ezobject:attribute.name: Tags
ezobject:attribute.keyword-string: eZ, eZ Awards. Winner, Lagardere, Premiere, Site of the year

node-assignment.name: Site of the Year eZ Award goes to Lagardere

ezremote:object.name: The eZ Awards 2007 Partner of the Year goes to France

ezobject:object-translation.object_name: The eZ Awards 2007 Partner of the Year goes to France

ezobject:attribute.name: Title
ezobject:attribute.text: The eZ Awards 2007 Partner of the Year goes to France

section.paragraph: The annual eZ Awards conference comprises of many international companies and attendees that come together in Norway to share their information. Every year, eZ Systems recognizes the contribution of key members of the eZ Ecosystem. The wide spread Partner network is the core essence of the open source business model at eZ and recognizing the Partners is an essential part of the eZ Awards.

paragraph.line: The Partner of the Year award is a prestigious award granted to the the Partner based on the following criteria:

li.paragraph: Focus on eZ Publish Now and Premium

section.paragraph: The 2007 award went to Ingénieurs & Consultants, and integrator company located in France for their contribution to with eZ Publish projects.

"It is wonderful to see how Partners really push forward, booking projects and working with customers to earn Partner points and advance through the Partner model" says Bertand Maugain, Global Partner Manager at eZ Systems.
eZ is pleased to have so many Partners at the top levels of the Partner model.

ezobject:attribute.name: Tags
ezobject:attribute.keyword-string: Ecosystem, eZ, eZ Awards, Fun, Partner

node-assignment.name: The eZ Awards 2007 Partner of the Year goes to France

ezremote:object.name: Press and Media mentions at the 2007 eZ Conference

ezobject:object-translation.object_name: Press and Media mentions at the 2007 eZ Conference

ezobject:attribute.name: Title
ezobject:attribute.text: Press and Media mentions at the 2007 eZ Conference

section.paragraph: The eZ Conference and Awards 2007 gained excellent visibility and media attention both during and after the event. Prominent speakers and journalists happily boasted about their experience at the conference.
Some special mentions include:
"From my perspective, the conference was both a huge success and a very pleasant experience" - Dag-Erling Smørgrav, Linpro.

"The eZ Conference this year was a great success, it was basically a three days long celebration of Open Source and for those that didn't attend I must say you really missed out something GREAT!" - Gaia Ajax Widges.
"eZ Conference is typically quite good about covering information business from three major standpoints: those relevant to business, technology and content management professionals" - CMS WIRE
eZ is proud to have had such positive feedback and is looking forward to the 6th annual eZ Conference and Awards in 2008.

ezobject:attribute.name: Tags
ezobject:attribute.keyword-string: 2007, eZ, eZ Awards, Fun, Media, Press, Show, Social

node-assignment.name: Press and Media mentions at the 2007 eZ Conference

ezremote:object.name: eZ Conference Hits all Time High for Attendee Participation

ezobject:object-translation.object_name: eZ Conference Hits all Time High for Attendee Participation

ezobject:attribute.name: Title
ezobject:attribute.text: eZ Conference Hits all Time High for Attendee Participation

section.paragraph: Skien, Norway: A small coastal town in the south east of Norway is the home to the largest open at comprised of culturally rich settings and activities. The Partner Day networking event was held at Brekkeparken Park, a historical museum park in the center of Skien.

The eZ Awards were held at the Ibsen House, a cultural auditorium named after the playwrite, Henrik Ibsen. The attendees and sponsors have been steadily rising every year but the 2007 number of attendees sky rocketed. The company hopes to top the 800 mark for the 2008.

ezobject:attribute.name: Tags
ezobject:attribute.keyword-string: eZ, eZ Awards, eZ Conference, Fun, Social

node-assignment.name: eZ Conference Hits all Time High for Attendee Participation

ezremote:object.name: Norwegian Minister Opens the eZ Awards Reception

ezobject:object-translation.object_name: Norwegian Minister Opens the eZ Awards Reception

ezobject:attribute.name: Title
ezobject:attribute.text: Norwegian Minister Opens the eZ Awards Reception

section.paragraph: Heidi Grande Røys, the Norwegian Minister of Information Technology, opened the eZ Awards night with a speech that explained Norway's commitment to Open Source software and open standards.

“Increased use of open source software in the public sector can also provide the basis for increased competence building in society. A culture of sharing software developed “in-house” will benefit organisations, businesses, students and ICT specialists.” Said the Minister as she addressed the attentive audience.
It was an honor for eZ Systems to welcome such a prominent guest to open the eZ Awards night and the event gained excellent recognition from the media and the community in Grenland.

ezobject:attribute.name: Image
ezobject:attribute.alternative-text: Norwegian Minister Opens the eZ Awards

ezobject:attribute.name: Tags
ezobject:attribute.keyword-string: eZ, eZ Awards, eZ Conference, Norway

node-assignment.name: Norwegian Minister Opens the eZ Awards Reception

section.paragraph: The eZ Awards are awarded during the annual eZ Conference. Winners of the eZ Awards have contributed to the eZ Ecosystem in an exceptional way. Giving to the eZ Ecosystem consists not only of code, bug fixes and expertise in technical matters but also includes being actively engaged in daily business, promoting eZ products and services, giving feedback and buying into the eZ values.

With the eZ Awards, eZ Systems emphasizes the importance of every contribution, be it small or great. As such, the eZ Awards are a way to reward those who have made the extra effort and who have added value to the overall eZ Ecosystem, proving that business enterprises and community members are serious about applying the full power of eZ products and related expertise.
The Categories and Winners for the 2007 eZ Awards:
Mikko Koppanen
Indexing Multiple Binary File Types by Jordan Hirsch - Mindshare
Damien Pobel
Web-Connector for Microsoft Dynamics NAV and SAP by silver solutions
Xavier Dutoit
all2e GmbH
Ingénieurs & Consultants
Premiere by Lagardere
Ministry of Defense by Prosodie
Paul Forsyth
eZ Systems would like to congratulate the 2007 winners for their contribution and look forward to the 2008 awards next summer.

ezobject:attribute.name: Tags
ezobject:attribute.keyword-string: eZ, eZ Awards, eZ Conference, Honorary award

ezremote:object.name: eZ Conference - the biggest Open Source CMS Conference

ezobject:object-translation.object_name: eZ Conference - the biggest Open Source CMS Conference

ezobject:attribute.name: Title
ezobject:attribute.text: eZ Conference - the biggest Open Source CMS Conference

section.paragraph: The annual eZ Conference is the largest Open Source Content Management event in Europe that welcomes over 500 participants from around the globe. The 2007 event marked the first year that eZ introduced a sponsorship program for its Partners and Customers to gain marketing and business value from the conference.

During the 2006 eZ Conference, Partners were given the opportunity to exhibit and after positive feedback from the attendees and the Partners, the sponsorship program was implemented in the same model as most of the large IT conferences around the world.

The sponsorship program aimed to give an affordable entry cost for smaller Partners while also attracting larger Partners offering extensive visibility throughout the conference. As soon as the sponsorship model was announced to the Partners, subscriptions started. As expected the first and most eager to subscribe were the long standing traditional eZ Partners.

For partners and associated with earlier experience with the eZ Conference it were necessary to explain the great position that the conference have with Open Source CMS and the values that is given to sponsors. IBM used their sponsorship in order to better understand the local Open Source business model. All together almost a dozen of IBM's middle management team were visiting the conference during the two days.

Sponsors on a more regional level were also attracted to the event, for marketing value. Visit Grenland, aimed to get more tourists to the region were the conference was hosted and where the eZ Systems HQ is located. The local university college was represented with a booth, trying to recruit students from abroad.

“It's amazing to see how this conference has been growing from a small gathering of eZ Publish enthusiasts to a commercial market place like the one we see today” says Jan Aril Sigvartsen from the silver sponsor WebDeal AS. He is one of the few persons that has been attending all five eZ Conferences.
The creativity displayed by the sponsor booths was inspiring to see, and truly boasted well for the sponsorship program in 2007.

node-assignment.name: eZ Conference - the biggest Open Source CMS Conference

ezremote:object.name: Will you attend the eZ Conference 2008?

ezobject:object-translation.object_name: Will you attend the eZ Conference 2008?

ezobject:attribute.name: Name
ezobject:attribute.text: Will you attend the eZ Conference 2008?

ezoption.name: Will you attend the eZ Conference 2008?

node-assignment.name: Will you attend the eZ Conference 2008?

section.paragraph: Tonight, at the eZ Awards 2007 Presentation, Paul Forsyth, Technical Director of Vision With Technology, UK was presented the most prestigious award of the evening. The Honorary award is a yearly award and Paul definitely deserved to win it this year based on his contribution to the eZ Ecosystem. Paul fit the criteria perfectly based on his long standing membership with eZ and his admirable conduct and example to his peers. The Norwegian IT Minister gave Paul his award in front of 800 eZ enthusiasts.

Who would have thought that a small town in the south of Norway would host the biggest open source content management event in Europe? Well its true, the weather is perfect here in Skien, Norway and the attendees are definitely enjoying the quaint Norwegian city. Getting here was quite the feat, as the closest airport was 45 minutes away. The scenery on the way to Skien was spectacular and made it all worth the trip. The best part of having an international conference in a small town like Skien is that the conference really gets that personal feeling, a feeling that is hard to find, and harder to maintain in a big, bustling major city

ezremote:object.name: Fun Booths at the eZ Conference 2007

ezobject:object-translation.object_name: Fun Booths at the eZ Conference 2007

ezobject:attribute.name: Title
ezobject:attribute.text: Fun Booths at the eZ Conference 2007

section.paragraph: At any conference where there are exhibitors, its always great to see the new and creative ways in which companies attract people to the booth. This year at the eZ Conference, some of the highlights included the IBM/VisionWT/WebDeal booth where they put their booth space together and made one large area equipped with two luxury massage chairs and a flat screen TV with targeted messaging. The Nexus booth was giving out free pizza from Dolly Dimples. The eZ booth was by far the sexiest with bar tables and stools, sleek graphics and a booth staff that was friendly and informative.

node-assignment.name: Fun Booths at the eZ Conference 2007
